com.paypal.selion.node.servlets

Class NodeForceRestartServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.paypal.selion.node.servlets.NodeForceRestartServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class NodeForceRestartServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A simple servlet which basically issues a System.exit() when invoked. This servlet would have to be injected into the node [not the Grid] so that it can help in terminating the node.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
